It looks like you're off to a slow start today with just one meal and a total of 200 calories. Remember, fueling your body consistently throughout the day is key to reaching your daily target of 2325 calories. 

To improve, aim to add at least two more balanced meals or snacks later in the day that include a mix of protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates. For example, consider a hearty breakfast with eggs and whole-grain toast or a nutritious lunch with lean protein and plenty of veggies. You've got this!
